verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is my <S%H216>light<s%> and my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; whom shall I <S%H3372>fear<s%>? the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%>; of whom shall I be <S%H6342>afraid<s%>?

When the <S%H7489>wicked<s%>, even my <S%H6862>enemies<s%> and my <S%H341>foes<s%>, <S%H7126>came<s%> upon me to eat <S%H398>up<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, they <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%>.

Though a <S%H4264>army<s%> should <S%H2583>encamp<s%> against <S%H3820>me<s%>, my heart shall not <S%H3372>fear<s%>: though <S%H4421>war<s%> should <S%H6965>rise<s%> against <S%H982>me<s%>, in this will I be confident.

<S%H259>One<s%> thing have I <S%H7592>desired<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that will I <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3427>after<s%>; that I may live in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%>, to <S%H2372>behold<s%> the <S%H5278>beauty<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and to <S%H1239>inquire<s%> in his <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

For in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble<s%> he shall <S%H6845>hide<s%> me in his <S%H5520>pavilion<s%>: in the <S%H5643>secret<s%> of his <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> shall he <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H7311>me<s%>; he shall set me up upon a <S%H6697>rock<s%>.

And now shall my <S%H7218>head<s%> be lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> above my <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H2076>me<s%>: therefore will I offer in his <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8643>joy<s%>; I will <S%H7891>sing<s%>, <S%H2167>Yes<s%>, I will sing praises unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, when I <S%H7121>cry<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%>: have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> also upon <S%H6030>me<s%>, and answer me.
When you <S%H1245>said<s%>, Seek you my <S%H6440>face<s%>; my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6440>you<s%>, Your face, <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, will I <S%H1245>seek<s%>.

<S%H5641>Hide<s%> not your <S%H6440>face<s%> far from <S%H5186>me<s%>; put not your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5186>away<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%>: you have been my <S%H5833>help<s%>; <S%H5203>leave<s%> me <S%H5800>not<s%>, neither forsake <S%H430>me<s%>, O God of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>.
When my <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, then the Lord will take me <S%H622>up<s%>.
<S%H3384>Teach<s%> me your <S%H1870>way<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H5148>lead<s%> me in a <S%H4334>plain<s%> <S%H734>path<s%>, because of my <S%H8324>enemies<s%>.

<S%H5414>Deliver<s%> me not over unto the <S%H5315>will<s%> of my <S%H6862>enemies<s%>: for <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> are risen <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H3307>me<s%>, and such as breathe out <S%H2555>cruelty<s%>.
I had <S%H3884>fainted<s%>, unless I had <S%H539>believed<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2898>goodness<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.
<S%H6960>Wait<s%> on the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: be of good <S%H2388>courage<s%>, and he shall <S%H553>strengthen<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%>: <S%H6960>wait<s%>, I <S%H3068>say<s%>, on the Lord.
